Category: Mask

(Cactus) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, PEG-150 Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Steareth-20, Xanthan

PEG-150 Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Steareth-20, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
